name: Knowledge
meaning: The foundation of all in existence. To look, listen, observe, and respect.
application: Gather facts before acting. Listen more than you speak. Establish a solid foundation for any new endeavor.

name: Wisdom
meaning: Wise words, ways, and actions. The application of knowledge.
application: Put what you know into action. Speak your truth. Demonstrate your knowledge through tangible deeds.

name: Understanding
meaning: The mental picture one draws of knowledge. To see things clearly.
application: Seek clarity in all things. Ensure you are understood and that you understand others. Visualize the outcome before starting.

name: Culture/Freedom
meaning: One's way of life. Freedom is to be free from mental and physical slavery.
application: Practice your culture daily. Live freely by your own principles. Be self-determined in your choices and movements.

name: Power/Refinement
meaning: The force of truth. To make manifest. Refinement is to be made pure.
application: Refine your character and habits. Stand in your truth. Clean up your physical and mental environment to allow power to flow.

name: Equality
meaning: To be equal in all things. Knowledge, Wisdom, and Understanding.
application: Treat others with fairness. Share knowledge with those who seek it. Maintain balance in your dealings and relationships.

name: God
meaning: The original man. The black man of Asia. The supreme being.
application: Master yourself and your emotions. Take full responsibility for your world. Lead by example and create positive change.

name: Build/Destroy
meaning: To add on to or take away from. To build constitutes proper growth and development.
application: Build something positive every day. Remove negativity and stagnation. Add value to every cipher you enter.

name: Born
meaning: To be brought into existence. The completion of all things.
application: Bring your ideas to completion. Manifest your goals into reality. Birth a new level of understanding or achievement.

name: Cipher
meaning: A circle consisting of 360 degrees. A person, place, or thing. Completion.
application: Complete your cycle. Encompass all things within your awareness. Protect your surroundings and keep your cipher clean.
